title: A Government of Wolves: The Emerging American Police State
description: In A Government of Wolves: The Emerging American Police State, John W. Whitehead charts America's transition from a society governed by we the people to a police state governed by the strong arm of the law. In such an environment, the law becomes yet another tool to oppress the people. As a constitutional attorney of national prominence, and as president of The Rutherford Institute, an international civil liberties organization, Whitehead has been at the forefront of the fight for civil liberties in this country.
